nodes.text: After encountering Dume in a dream, the Jedi Ezra Bridger was given a key stone from the Lothal Jedi Temple by the White Loth-wolf. Bridger and his companions would use the stone to decrypt a mural depicting the Force wielders, and allow Bridger to enter the World Between Worlds, a mystical plane outside of time and space. The key stone had three hands, one closed, one firm and open, and another relaxed and open. The three symbols were encircled by circular designs.
